application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Condition 2 (Cycle parking, refuse) of Appeal Decision ref:  APP/R5510/W/23/3319240, (Hillingdon Council ref. 27994/APP/2021/3851), dated 24-01-2024  (Change of use from Class C4 house in multiple occupancy (HMO) to Sui Generis HMO for 7 bed and 7 persons with no external alterations.)
decision_conditions: The applicant has failed to demonstrate, with the submission of satisfactory details, that the development will promote sustainable travel and provide adequate facilities for bicycle parking together with waste and refuse storage in compliance with Policies DMHB 11, DMT 2, DMT 5, of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 2 (2020), Policies D6, SI 7, T2 and T5 of the London Plan (2021) and Paragraph 116 of the NPPF (2023).
